subject: Delegation of Powers with respect to O&M works for 4/6 lane stretches mainted by NHAI.
text: 'raiy 7rrzly TTHrf]gfetan<U T4t / Phona : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (te& 9a5 aT rHN AEd) # Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 {1 {1 HT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 gd 6, #ver-10, ETrqI;, T @ari-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No.1/041/217/2007-Admn 08.11 , 2012 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATION/FINANCE (98/2012) Sub: Delegatlon ot Power wlth respect to OLM works for 4/6 lane strelches malntalned by NHAI In partial modification to Policy Circular: Admin/Finance No.88/2012 dated 01.08.2012 on the above subject, it has been decided to modify para 4 of circular dated 01.08.2012, as under: "In case of bids invited by R.O. if the lowest bid amount is within 15% increase over the estimated cost, accepting authority shall be R.O. concerned; when amount of lowest bid exceeds estimated cost by 15% Or more, accepting authority shall be Member. For bids invited at HQ, accepting authority for bids within 15% increase over estimated cost would be Member concerned and if the lowest bid received exceeds estimated cost by 15% Or more; the accepting authority shall be Chairman Full justification in such cases shall be recorded: 2.
